response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. The product offers unparalleled value and efficiency, tailored specifically to meet your unique needs.

Considering its exceptional capabilities and the benefits it promises, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell the product to you for $1,150,000. This price reflects our commitment to providing high-quality solutions while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties.

Please let us know if this offer aligns with your expectations and budget. We are confident that our product will exceed your requirements and deliver substantial returns on investment. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
